description: Title of experiment (like you would see for a peer-reviewed scientific publication, meaningful, and captures the purpose of experiment you did), your name,  ID, contact details, no abstract needed for this super short paper
Single paragraph stating background, hypothesis, and your prediction(s)
Single brief paragraph stating findings (including basic summary statistics) and single figure with figure legend (legend and figure at the end of paper)
Single paragraph stating conclusion and implications of what you tested with these data
A total of 3 references, recent published within the last 5 years in a peer-reviewed journal
